footer.companyDescription: We are committed to providing the best healthcare services with a team of professional doctors and modern technology.
footer.addressLine1: Linh Trung Ward, Thu Duc City

header.title: About HealthCare
header.subtitle: We are committed to providing the best healthcare services with professional doctors and the most advanced medical technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: HealthCare was founded with the mission to democratize healthcare - making high-quality healthcare more accessible to everyone.

vision.title: Vision 2030
points: Become Vietnam's No.1 digital healthcare platform
Integrate AI and IoT in healthcare

commitment.title: Quality Commitment
commitment.desc: We continuously improve service quality and invest in technology to deliver the best patient experience.

values.title: Core Values
values.subtitle: These values guide all of our actions

dedication.title: Dedication
dedication.desc: We always put patients' health and satisfaction first

safety.title: Safety
safety.desc: Strictly following international medical standards and data protection

convenience.title: Convenience
convenience.desc: 24/7 service with a modern online booking system

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: From the early days to today

2022.title: Technology
2022.desc: Applied AI in diagnosis and consultation

cta.title: Join Us
cta.desc: Be part of the HealthCare community and build a better future for healthcare with us

header.title: Contact Us
header.subtitle: We are always ready to listen and support you. Reach out to us anytime.

form.title: Send a Message
form.desc: Fill in the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible

consultation.title: Online Consultation
consultation.desc: Get advice from doctors via video call or chat

appointment.title: Book Appointment
appointment.desc: Schedule an appointment with the right specialist

support.title: Customer Support
support.desc: 24/7 support team ready to assist you

map.title: Location
map.subtitle: Find us in the city center

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Some common questions customers often ask

items.q: How do I book an appointment?
items.a: You can book an appointment online through our website or mobile app. Just choose a doctor, a suitable time, and confirm the booking.

items.q: How much does a consultation cost?
items.a: The consultation fee depends on the department and doctor. You can view the detailed fee on each doctor's information page.
Yes, you can cancel an appointment at least 24 hours in advance without a fee. Later cancellations may incur charges.
We accept payments through common health insurance providers. Please contact us for more details.

cta.title: Need Emergency Support?
cta.desc: Our 24/7 support team is always ready to assist you

header.title: Doctors List
header.subtitle: Search and book appointments with top doctors
